did.abstract: Title abstract, dated 1910 and created by the M. Englehardt Real Estate Co. for parcels of land located at 2543-2551 Bedford Avenue, between Avenue C and Avenue D in Brooklyn, New York. Typewritten. The abstract traces ownership of land held by members of the Vanderveer family from 1803 to 1910. It includes a blueprint map of the land parcels and transcripts of the last wills and testaments of several Vanderveer family members.
